doc:
Buddy Swan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buddy_Swan 0 Paul "Buddy" Swan (October 24, 1929 – March 21, 1993) (also credited as Buddy Swann) was an American child actor, best known for playing the title character of the 1941 film Citizen Kane as an eight-year-old boy.He also appeared in the horror film The Ape, the horror comedy Scared Stiff, and the Academy-Award nominated film The Fighting Sullivans, playing one of the Sullivan brothers in their youth.Swan also appeared as a young actor in Broadway plays including Mr. Sycamore (1942) and The World We Make (1942). Paul_"_Buddy_"_Swan ( October_24_,_1929 – March_21_,_1993 ) ( also_credited as Buddy_Swann ) was an_American_child_actor , best_known for playing the_title_character of the_1941_film_Citizen_Kane as an_eight-year-old_boy.He also appeared in the_horror_film The_Ape , the_horror_comedy_Scared_Stiff , and the_Academy-Award nominated film The_Fighting_Sullivans , playing one of the_Sullivan_brothers in their_youth.Swan also appeared as a_young_actor in Broadway plays_including Mr._Sycamore ( 1942 ) and The_World We Make ( 1942 ) .
